values.value: ISO 27001 Control A.9.2.3 requires organizations to manage privileged access rights and review user access rights regularly. Users with excessive permissions or dormant accounts pose security risks and must be identified and remediated through periodic access reviews.
ISO/IEC 27001:2022 A.9.2.3 - Management of privileged access rights, A.9.2.5 - Review of user access rights

1. Conduct quarterly access reviews for all users with privileged access. 2. Identify and remove access rights for inactive users (90+ days). 3. Review and justify all "Modify All Data" and "View All Data" permissions. 4. Implement least privilege principle for all user access. 5. Document access review decisions and maintain audit trail. 6. Automate access review scheduling and notification processes.
